title: Geth 1.5.0-unstable crashes
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.5.0-unstable
OS & Version: Windows 10
Commit hash : (if `develop`)
#### Expected behaviour

1.5.0 would continue syncing the chain, where 1.4.14 was stopped (in my case at block 2376961).
#### Actual behaviour

It started with upgrading and converting database. At the step converting 200000 canonical numbers.... it crashed
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

download blockchain with 1.4.14, when it hangs, upgrade to 1.5

**Output from geth.exe**

D:\geth>geth1416.exe --datadir="EthereumFast" --rpc --nat=none --verbosity=4 --cache=3072
